main_definition: The period from birth until death, or the duration of time that an individual is expected to live.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Total length of a person's life
meanings_and_examples.example: They were married for five decades, spanning over half their lifetime.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The time during which an object or structure is expected to last before it needs replacement
meanings_and_examples.example: This car has a manufacturer's warranty of 10 years, covering its entire lifetime.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A long and continuous period that one experiences in a certain aspect of life
meanings_and_examples.example: His career spanned over several decades, marking a significant part of his personal history.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The time during which a particular interest or passion is pursued by an individual
meanings_and_examples.example: She dedicated her life to the study of marine biology, devoting countless hours over several years to this field.
